Package dataaccess

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
dataaccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
A class used to send commands to a MySQL database Can create sql statements, run them, then retrieve the result in the necessary form based on the type of the generic parameter T.
